doctor.name: Dr. Sajeda Islam
doctor.specialty: Arthritis, Pain, Paralysis & Physical Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Sajeda Islam is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Narayanganj. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (PMR-BSMMU). She is a Consultant, Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation at Mugda Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Sajeda Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 4:30pm to 8:30pm (Sat, Mon & Wed).
